name: Claustroom
description:
Claustroom is a FPS + Match 3 mashup, originally made for Ludum Dare 41 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/claustroom)

Your goals:

  • Match 3+ cubes of the same color to destroy them and free some space
  • Don't get stuck
  • Don't get pressed against the ceiling
  • Don't let cubes get pressed against the ceiling
  • Try to get a high score

Some TODOs:

  • some kind of tutorial
  • better colors (?)
  • better sound mixing (??)
  • global high score (???)
